description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 1/24/2006

Nick is shocked to find out that Ridge has proposed to Brooke.  Brooke admits that she is vulnerable to Ridge but her feelings for Nick are still alive.  Meanwhile, Ridge is glad to hear about Felicia’s child until he knows that Nick is the father and quickly becomes angry but his mood changes when he learns that Felicia is dying.  Meanwhile, Stephanie and Eric prepare for a Forrester family gathering at their house. Stephanie tells Eric she is serious about giving up her war with Brooke.  Eric secretly proposes to Jackie, who says yes, but tells her that they need to wait to announce their engagement.
